reviewText: Monk is absolutely the best comedy detective show that haas ever been produced and psych runs a close 2nd choice behind it.

My husband and I don't agree on a lot of TV shows, but every Friday night during the Monk/Psych season, we sit down and watch these shows together.  Being able to buy the DVDs for both in one pack saves money (which we like), and the shows are so great that you can watch them over and over without getting tired of the episodes.  It's an added bonus that the extra features (interviews, outtakes, commentaries) are all interesting.

those who listen to these two series should know that these two again, have succeed on doing great episode -- chemistry between characters, full of laugh, some drama and some tears of joy. I believe sincerely that this pack is awesome and i just can't wait to get the other seasons. Really, it is a must for all fan of monk and psych, a good comedy cop tv show. Watch it with your family (or watching with friends or alone also work :P ) ^^
Two great shows - a great price for the pair. What more could anyone want?

Monk is still my #1 favorite tv series and Psych is my #2 favorite.  The writers, actors and everyone who is apart of these shows are amazingly creative!  Their creativity actually goes beyond the same old story lines that most shows have to resort to fill up time, like sex, violence, gore, and bad language.

I love listening to the shows when I am doing my chores and working in my art studio.  It keeps my mood lighter and happier:)

I hope they keep creating these wonderful shows for many(many) more years!
Great value. Monk and Psych on USA Friday nights, once is not enough. You have to have the DVDs to enjoy it again.
